bottom_taptwice: Tap back button again to exit
player_noSetting: No settings available for this video.
screen_account_edit_fulfill: Please fulfill all the text field
screen_account_edit_delete_descrip: Deleting your account will remove all of your information from our database. This cannot be undone
screen_account_descrip: Enjoy listening music with better audio quality, without restriction and ad-free experience.
screen_account_subcen_descrip: Payment charged via Tunes Account and automatically renews unless turned off (Apple ID Settings) at least 24 hours before the end of curent periods
setting_general_player_descrip: Fast forward or backward time adjustment
setting_info_question1: Why am I having connection issues?
setting_info_answer1: Does it happen over both WiFi and 3/4G? If it happens on both then the issue isn't related to connection and is being caused by another eg: device/setup or the eTube app itself.
setting_info_question2: How to change language of eTube?
setting_info_answer2: Currently eTube only has English language, in the future we will update more languages.
setting_info_question3: I have successfully purchased Premium, but why is the ad still appearing?
setting_info_answer3: Try disabling eTube completely and reopening. If the above condition persists, please contact our communication channels.
setting_descrip: You will unlock all the above features when you upgrade the package to Premium.
record_descrip:
In order to utilize this particular functionality, it is necessary to grant permission for speech recognition access.

Kindly adjust the settings accordingly to enable the usage of this feature.

Please note that you have the flexibility to modify your selection at any time within the application settings.
imgpicker_descrip:
In order to utilize this particular functionality, it is necessary to grant permission for photo library access.

Kindly adjust the settings accordingly to enable the usage of this feature.

Please note that you have the flexibility to modify your selection at any time within the application settings.
